name: Steamed Hams but a Playable Remix
name_original: Steamed Hams but a Playable Remix
description:
Musical Folklore.
It's basically a video sound board.

Download to play. If you make videos, please credit Aquma as the developer.
Press keys to play samples.
Shift + certain keys plays alternate samples. Space button to toggle looped playback or single play. Escape to quit.
